ANSES, Agence nationale de sécurité sanitaire de l'alimentation, de l'environnement et du travail, FRANCE, Maisons- Alfort
member of expert committee on chemical risk assessment in food, and on chemical risk assessment on consuming products
Laboratoire de Toxicologie alimentaire, EA 3880, Université de Bretagne Occidentale, FRANCE, Plouzané

member of the laboratory until 2012, then director of the lab. responsible of the scientific orientations of the laboratory, responsible of the exposure team. Professor in risk assessment at the master level. Main orientations of the lab are : exposure to natural toxins (mycotoxins, phycotoxins), optimisation of the sampling strategy in food contaminants risk assessment, aggregate exposure to chemicals in cosmetology. More than 99% of fundings are public fundings.
